overview: Nicole Zwiren, director of “HIV, A Whole Different Story,” interviews top AIDS scientists, doctors, journalists and HIV patients regarding the science, or lack thereof, behind HIV. “HIV, A Whole Different Story,” delves deep into the history of how AIDS began in America and how a certain retrovirus (“LAV” or “HTLV III”) became the most infamous virus (“HIV”).
title: HIV, a Whole Different Story
